name: John Doe
title: Introduction to Programming
feedbackText: The course was excellent! I learned a lot and the examples were very helpful. The instructor was clear and engaging.

name: Jane Smith
title: Data Science Fundamentals
feedbackText: I enjoyed the hands-on exercises in this class. The material was challenging but presented in a way that made it accessible. Great learning experience!

name: Bob Johnson
title: Web Development Bootcamp
feedbackText: The instructor was knowledgeable, and the content covered a wide range of topics. I appreciated the real-world projects that helped reinforce the concepts learned in class.
